price: 138 Annonce aux hypocrites qu’ils sont voués à un douloureux châtiment.
arabic: بَشِّرِ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ بِأَنَّ لَهُمۡ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: bashiri al-munāfiqīna bi-anna lahum ʿadhāban alīman
